sentence.Network_en: Anyof about 900 species ( order Chiroptera ) of the only mammals to have evolved true flight.
sentence.Network_cn: 九百多种,属 翼手目.是唯一一类演化出真正飞翔能力的哺乳动物的统称.

sentence.Network_en: Among tham , 7 species is belonged to Rodenria, and Carnivora, Chiroptera and Insectivora only have 1 species respectively.
sentence.Network_cn: 其中食虫目1种 、 翼手目1种 、 食肉目1种、啮齿目7种.
